mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boardReply(board_boardId, member_userId, content) VALUES (#{board_boardId}, #{member_userId}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT r.boardReplyId, r.board_boardId, r.content, r.insertDatetime, m.nickName, r.member_userId, (r.member_userId = #{userName}) editable FROM boardReply r LEFT JOIN member m ON r.member_userId = m.userId WHERE board_boardId = #{board_boardId} ORDER BY boardReplyId DESC
SELECT boardReplyId, board_boardId, content, insertDatetime FROM boardReply WHERE boardReplyId = #{boardReplyId}
